name: The Egyptian Revelation
description:
Uncover the secrets of Ancient Egyptians in this short puzzle adventure!

You have been called to this ancient pyramid through a dream. What secrets could be hiding here? As an archeologist, you have never been this curious. Play the game to find out!

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

  • WASD or Arrow Keys for movement
  • Mouse & Left Mouse Button for interacting

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Originally created for Ludum Dare 36, that's the reason the game is short. It is fun nonetheless, and tests your skills. How fast can you complete it?

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

If you like my work, you can donate a bit through purchasing this game (even $1 would do). That would really be helpful & supportive.
